name: Toast
description: Toast is used to display messages in an overlay.

group.label: group
group.title: Unique identifier of a message group.

position.label: position
position.title: Position of the toast in viewport.

base-z-index.label: baseZIndex
base-z-index.title: Base zIndex value to use in layering.

breakpoints.label: breakpoints
breakpoints.title: Object literal to define styles per screen size.

close-icon.label: closeIcon
close-icon.title: Icon to display in the toast close button.

info-icon.label: infoIcon
info-icon.title: Icon to display in the toast with info severity.

warn-icon.label: warnIcon
warn-icon.title: Icon to display in the toast with warn severity.

error-icon.label: errorIcon
error-icon.title: Icon to display in the toast with error severity.

success-icon.label: successIcon
success-icon.title: Icon to display in the toast with success severity.

close-button-props.label: closeButtonProps
close-button-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to the close button.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

pt-options.label: ptOptions
pt-options.title: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.
